
### 1. DEseq Analysis of Pasilla Dataset

~~~~~~~~
library("pasilla")
datafile <- system.file("extdata", "pasilla_gene_counts.tsv", package="pasilla", mustWork=TRUE)
count_table = read_tsv(datafile)
annotfile <- system.file("extdata", "pasilla_sample_annotation.csv", package="pasilla", mustWork=TRUE)
design_table <- read.csv(annotfile, row.names=1)
design_table <- design_table[,c("condition","type")]
results=rna_diff_expr(count_table, design_table, method="DEseq2")
~~~~~~~~
